page.title: 03FAIR
page.content: Once every year in{Keyworth}there is a{show}and fair.There are various things happening in the main arena including parachute jumps, a mini circus.The fair has a Big Wheel , a Waltzer a Speedway and Dodgems and other rides.There are these events, at the{Show.} 1.00pm gates open 1.30pm{Show}opening 1.40pm British Youth Marching Band 2.00pm Fancy Dress Compition 2.30pm Colt Car Parachute Display 3.00pm Horse's Dressage 3.15pm British Youth Marching Band 3.30pm Augusto's Minature Circus 4.15pm Vintage Car Show There are lot's of Sideshows etc. scattered around the Rectory Field (where the{show}is held.)Most of the money goes to charitys, but some is used for the upkeep of the field.
